item.description:
Its that time of the year that us footy fans love, especially if the team u barrack for made the top 8 and have a chance at glory on the last Saturday in September.

Throughout the finals series we will be showing games at the Phoenix Landing from 12pm Saturdays so come down in your teams colours and cheer em on!

We will be showing the Hawthorn v Bulldogs game and the Adelaide v Collingwood game.


Go Hawks!

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: AFL FINALS FOOTY!
